data.actual_result: when user send it as a link a full thumbnail appears as normal however if you send in a rich embed image tag it will ALWAYS render as a poop and give 412 and/or 502 in the network tab
data.expected_result: it should render the same in both rich embed and normal user sending message
data.short_description: gif embeds with user but not rich embed (in image tag)
data.steps_to_repro: - send a gif (of imgur where its actually stored as gifv heres a cat gif one https://i.imgur.com/2n1IvgN.gif as a person embed will work how ever send in in a rich embed image tag and wont
